Summary: I have been watching these for years from my backyrad, every clear night.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Oil City
There were no other sightings in Oil City on or around October 23rd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI have witnessed many events, some near actual planes. With no doubt I am sure pilots have seen them too for as close as they are. At one time it was almost as if they were going to crash. I have seen as many as 5 at one time, just hovering spinning colors. I have also witnessed something like a huge spot light in the sky that turned on and off.
